starter-landing.title: A simple example
starter-landing.description_text: Start to build your'e page from here.

first_page_long_text: The only one in Russia outstaffing company with professional halal slaughterers surrounds the slaughter by hand on an industrial scale.
profit_short_text: Increase in profits due to the production of more marginal products, including the possibility of producing semi-finished products
conveniently_short_text: A streamlined manual slaughter process with no downtime. Reducing the burden on the accounting department and the HR department.
exclusive_short_text: Rapid entry into the market of the Halal industry and coverage of new customers. Confident positioning, protection of reputation, improvement of the company's image, compliance with all Halal standards
high_professionalism_text: We provide a professional slaughter service according to all strict requirements and halal standards.
opportunities_and_prospects_text: Teamwork with key Halal certification bodies and assistance in promoting manufacturers' products to foreign markets.
streamlined_workflow_text: Our company implements a halal management system. We strictly monitor the quality of labor discipline. If necessary, we can replace the employee, and we take care of all unforeseen situations.
complex_services_agroholdings: Complex of Halal Services for Agroholdings
more_years_experience_range_services: More than 11 years of experience in slaughter services
investments_halal_slaughter: 35 million rubles of investments for the organization of Halal slaughter
speed_slaughter_per_hour: The speed of slaughter up to 12 000 heads per hour.
company_necessary_documents_certificates: Our company has the necessary list of documents and certificates
crew_two_people: Crew of two people from HS staff
attached_permanent_basis: Attachment to the company on a permanent basis
slaughter_chickens_hour: Slaughter of poultry meat up to 12,000 chickens per hour
reducing_burden_accounting_department: Reducing the burden on the accounting department and the HR department.
issues_registration_relations_between_ou: All issues related to the registration of personnel, relations between employees, vacations, absenteeism are assumed by our company.
benefits_agroholdings_text: Compliance with halal standards contributes to the rapid coverage of new customers and the expansion of the range. The opportunity to take a profitable share in the sales of halal products by competing in the CIS markets. Exporting products to Arab countries can increase profits. Halal staff is a strong partner with international recognition in the expanding halal market.
want_to_export_your_products: Do you want to export your products?
fill_form_contact_you: Fill out the form and we will contact you
are_currently_working_halal: Are you currently working with Halal?
thank_your_time_contact_soon: Thank you for your time. We will contact you soon.
would_like_certificate_cooperating: Would you like to get a HALAL certificate for free by cooperating with us?
